title: LeBlanc Death Sound
body:
Since you guys are not even making a single attempt to fix all of LeBlanc's audio bugs, I am hoping at least that you guys re add LeBlanc's death sounds for both her clone and herself.

Even if it's just minor, I would at least expect just one audio bug fix out of like 5 because this is the ''Report a Bug'' section right? And it's a legit bug. 

Example? Have LeBlanc die.

It's just annoying because I hope you guys also consider doing some sound bugs and not just visual bugs. You did this one with {{champion:60}} so why not {{champion:7}} ?

replies.body:
Hey SylvanasWrunner - 

Thanks for the report! 

In Elise's case, all of her VO was a. missing or b. playing totally incorrectly, which is why she received a bit more love in a more timely manner. 

Just checked out LeBlanc, and you're right - she's totally missing death VO on base and all skins. I'm in the process of writing up a ticket, and I'll be following up later. Not sure on a ETA for a fix, but it 100% won't be next patch.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=JifcMr3Q,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-18T19:18:21.042+0000)
>
> Hey SylvanasWrunner - 
> 
> Thanks for the report! 
> 
> In Elise's case, all of her VO was a. missing or b. playing totally incorrectly, which is why she received a bit more love in a more timely manner. 
> 
> Just checked out LeBlanc, and you're right - she's totally missing death VO on base and all skins. I'm in the process of writing up a ticket, and I'll be following up later. Not sure on a ETA for a fix, but it 100% won't be next patch.

You look at this stuff but not the things that alter the game?!

We do! However, I'm on Skins, so I keep an eye out and respond to skins (and sometimes champion issues like this where it's possible a new skin busted it D:). I'm not a subject matter expert in terms of gameplay, so I don't comment/look into those issues. There are Rioters who are, and they cruise the boards pertaining to issues on their team. ^-^

Could you also guys look into fixing her other sound bugs or at least make a confirmation if the ''bug'' is actually working as intended or if it's actually a bug?

Here is the other discussion with her other existing sound bugs:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/hQui1Qwr-gameplay-sound-leblanc-casting-ability-sound

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/s1MnvxyI-massive-leblanc-sound-bugs

And thank you for the great response!

Always glad to help! 

I'm thinking these other sounds may have been bumped out at the same time her death VO stopped playing. >_>

I caught up with the bros who I think accidentally broke these (they're super sorry), and they're in the process of looking into it. 

Thanks for linking these other threads as well, I'm passing those over to the team to investigate as well. I'll leave a quick note on the other threads, just for visibility's sake. 

As always, thanks for the solid bug reports - it helps us out a ton!

So it has been quite the patches since I have reported this bug. And with LeBlanc being a major part of the assassin roster update, is there any chance that this bug fix will get done before the update happens? 

Which also leads to my next question of when is the estimated patch (if you have) that will address the fix for this bug? Thank you!

I can catch up with the team and see if they can align this fix with the roster update. :)

We tend not to give estimates for bug fixes, as some may turn out to be more complex than others. The only time we would give a patch fix date would be once the issue has been resolved and verified.
Does this include the nid bug? (or did that team just mess it up too xD) cuz her healing grunt doesnt play when she heals someone.
Quick update on this - we're looking to get this resolved before/by the roster update. :)

Thank you once again for ensuring that this fix is still in play. I have to admit, I was a bit sad when I read the latest patch note and it wasn't there :(

Please try to fix all the addressed audio bugs :)

Greatly appreciated.

> [{quoted}](name=SylvanasWrunner,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=JifcMr3Q,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-09-08T07:01:38.531+0000)
>
> Thank you once again for ensuring that this fix is still in play. I have to admit, I was a bit sad when I read the latest patch note and it wasn't there :(
> 
> Please try to fix all the addressed audio bugs :)
> 
> Greatly appreciated.

.__.b Since we're doing some updates for LeBlanc in the roster update, we felt it was the best time since we're moving some files around anyhow, and it's best to wait, rather than fixing it and having something else break it again. 

Some audio issues are easier to fix than others, and I'll be honest, my focus is usually just on skins issues. We do have other QA friends who cruise the boards for issues pertaining to their teams, though!

I can't thank you enough now that all of her missing audios have been restored back to normal. It's really great to hear LeBlanc's voice again. Really happy about this.

Meanwhile, I'm gonna have a hard time with the new LeBlanc gameplay. Wish me luck! :)
Ahh, glad everything is back to normal! :D I'm sure you'll be able to handle the changes, it'll just take some practice. Thanks for your patience! ^-^
